input.sentences: took my daughter to the zoo today for the first time .
i know she is young | but she really enjoyed herself.she really took a liking to the penguins .
in the middle of looking at all the animals | we spotted a carousel and she just had to get on it .
after the rides | we went to see the giraffes.always liked how long their necks were.i wonder if they have any troubles or neck pain .
we really had a good time | and saw many different types of animals.we even got to pet a turtle .
output.sentences: There was this one time when a father and his daughter went to the zoo.
She took a liking to the penguins and enjoyed watching them.
They've been spotted in the middle of the carousel.
Some of the rides were causing troubles for the dad, like bringing him pain in his back.
By the time the trip was over, she could recite many different types of turtles.
